title: Background and foreground colors do not have a sufficient contrast ratio.
description: Low-contrast text is difficult or impossible for many users to read. [Learn more](https://web.dev/color-contrast/).

node.snippet: <a href="/crt/about/cor/documents/crtlapara.pdf" style="color: rgb(166, 130, 75); font-family: Georgia, Palatino, "Palatino Linoty…";">
node.nodeLabel: توافر خدمات المساعدة اللغوية – قسم الحقوق المدنية   (Arabic)
node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 3.48 (foreground color: #a6824b, background color: #fefdf9, font size: 9.8pt (13px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1
